metadata.title: Snowdrift Financials Demo Package
metadata.description: Complete demo scripts and validation queries for Insurance agents

claims_intake.setup: New flood damage claim for commercial property in Tromsø

steps.title: Claim Overview
steps.prompt: I need to review claim CLM-024723 that just came in. Can you give me a quick summary of what happened?

steps.title: Medical Details Extraction
steps.prompt: Extract all medical information from claim CLM-024723 and present it in a structured table. Include injuries, treatments, and prognosis.

steps.title: Inconsistency Detection
steps.prompt: Review all documents for claim CLM-024723 and identify any inconsistencies in the timeline, witness statements, or reported facts.

steps.title: Investigation Recommendations
steps.prompt: Based on your analysis of claim CLM-024723, what additional investigation steps would you recommend?

underwriting.setup: New commercial property application for Berg Handel Solutions AS in Kristiansand

steps.title: Location Risk Analysis
steps.prompt: I have a new commercial property application in Kristiansand. What can you tell me about the flood risk and historical claims in this area?

steps.title: Prior History Research
steps.prompt: Research the claims history for similar commercial properties in Kristiansand. Are there any patterns or concerns I should know about?

steps.title: Market Intelligence
steps.prompt: Find any recent market analysis or environmental reports that might affect underwriting decisions for Kristiansand.

steps.title: Underwriting Recommendation
steps.prompt: Based on all available information, provide your underwriting recommendation for Berg Handel Solutions AS in Kristiansand, including pricing, coverage considerations, and any special conditions.

claims_intake_quick_tests: What is the status and claim amount for CLM-024723?
Show me the top 5 highest value claims from the last month
Find all claims in Tromsø and their total value
List claims that might need medical review based on their descriptions
underwriting_quick_tests: What is the flood risk score for Kristiansand?
Compare claims history between Kristiansand and Oslo
Show me municipalities with flood risk scores above 7
How many policies do we have in Kristiansand?
Find areas with the highest average claim amounts
semantic_view_tests: What is our total premium income?
Show me the loss ratio by municipality
Which policy types have the highest claim frequency?
What are the top 5 municipalities by policy count?
Show me average claim amounts by flood risk category
